description: Chaindesk brings a no-code platform to create custom AI chatbots trained on your data. Our solution makes customer support easy and simplifies team workflows.
title: Chaindesk - ChatGPT AI Chat Bot for your business
keywords: AI Agent,AI Chatbot,Custom ChatGPT,AI Customer Support Chatbot
introduction: Chaindesk is a platform that allows users to create custom AI chatbots easily. It offers a free plan with limited features and paid plans for more advanced capabilities. The platform leverages Generative AI models like GPT-4 to provide precise responses and reduce customer support ticket volume instantly. Users can train a custom ChatGPT chatbot on their company data in minutes using Chaindesk's no-code platform.
pricing: Chaindesk offers a free plan with limited features, a Growth plan for $25/month, a Pro plan for $99/month, and an Enterprise plan for $499/month. Users can also request a custom plan for specific needs. With yearly billing, users save 20% on their subscription.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Chaindesk offers a free plan to get started quickly with limited features.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan or billing preferences?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can update your billing preferences or change your plan at any time from your account settings. With yearly billing, you save 20% on your subscription.

faqs.question: Can I add the chatbot to multiple sites?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add the chatbot to any number of sites for visitors to interact with.

faqs.question: Can the chatbot support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, the chatbot can support multiple languages and answer questions in different languages.

faqs.question: Is custom pricing available for enterprise customers?
faqs.answer: Yes, enterprise customers can request a custom pricing plan based on their specific needs.

faqs.question: How often is the chatbot retrained?
faqs.answer: Starting with the first paid plan, the chatbot is automatically retrained every week. Users can also manually trigger a retraining.

faqs.question: What should I do if the chatbot is not following instructions properly?
faqs.answer: Consider setting your Agent model to GPT-4-turbo for the best possible experience.
